describe('Sub Zero Client', function() {
  var SubzeroClient = require('../../../lib/sub_zero_client');
  var zmq = require('zmq');
  var uuid = require('uuid');
  var msgpack = require('msgpack-js');
  var Q = require('q');
 
  var config = {
    serviceId: 'SERVICE_V0',
    headers: {
      'X-Request-Id': uuid()
    },
    parameters: {
      pony: 'Rainbow Dash'
    }
  };
 
  describe('#call', function() {
    it('returns a Promise', function() {
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      var promise = client.call('foo');
 
      expect(promise.then).toEqual(jasmine.any(Function));
    });
 
    it('connects the zmq socket with setted identity', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: Function.apply(),
        connect: function(uri) {
          expect(this.identity).toEqual("bifrost#uuid");
          done();
        }
      });
      spyOn(uuid, 'v1').andReturn("uuid");
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo');
    });
 
    it('connects the zmq socket to the broker instance', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: Function.apply(),
        connect: function(uri) {
          expect(uri).toEqual("tcp://127.0.0.1:7778");
          done();
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo');
    });
 
    it('sends 5 frames to the zmq socket', function(done){
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        on: Function.apply(),
        send: function(message) {
          expect(message.length).toBe(5);
          done();
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo');
    });
 
    it('registers a "message" callback', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: function(type) {
          if (type === 'message') {
            done();
          }
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo');
    });
 
    it('registers a "error" callback', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: function(type) {
          if (type === 'error') {
            done();
          }
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo');
    });
 
    it('resolves the promise with the payload in the 4th frame when the "message" callback is executed', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: function(type, callback) {
          if (type === 'message') {
            callback(
              'frame1',
              'frame2',
              'verb:OK',
              msgpack.encode('frame4'),
              'frame5'
            );
          }
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo')
        .then(function(response){
          expect(response).toEqual('frame4');
          done();
        });
    });
 
    describe('Timeout', function() {
      it('fails the promise with the timeout error from errors collection', function(done) {
        spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
          connect: Function.apply(),
          send: Function.apply(),
          on: Function.apply(),
          close: Function.apply(),
        });
 
        var dfd = Q.defer();
        setTimeout(dfd.resolve, 2000);
        spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
        var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
        client.call('foo', {}, {timeout: 10})
          .fail(function (error) {
            expect(error.code).toBe(599);
            expect(error.body.developerMessage).toBeDefined();
            expect(error.body.userMessage).toBeDefined();
            expect(error.body.errorCode).toBeDefined();
            expect(error.headers).toBeDefined();
            done();
          });
      });
 
      it('fails the promise with the timeout error with a given timeout', function(done) {
        spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
          connect: Function.apply(),
          send: Function.apply(),
          on: Function.apply(),
          close: Function.apply(),
        });
 
        var dfd = Q.defer();
        setTimeout(dfd.resolve, 2000);
        spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
        var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
        client.call('foo', {}, {timeout: 10})
          .fail(function (error) {
            expect(error.code).toBe(599);
            done();
          });
      });
 
      it('fails the promise with the timeout error with a default timeout from config', function(done) {
        spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
          connect: Function.apply(),
          send: Function.apply(),
          on: Function.apply(),
          close: Function.apply(),
        });
 
        var dfd = Q.defer();
        setTimeout(dfd.resolve, 600);
        spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
        var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
        client.call('foo', {})
          .fail(function (error) {
            expect(error.code).toBe(599);
            done();
          });
      });
 
      it('resolves the promise before timeout', function(done) {
        spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
          connect: Function.apply(),
          send: Function.apply(),
          on: Function.apply(),
          close: Function.apply(),
        });
 
        var dfd = Q.defer();
        spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
        var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
        client.call('foo', {}, {timeout: 1000})
          .then(function () {
            done();
          });
 
        dfd.resolve();
      });
    });
 
    it('closes the socket when the promise is resolved', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: Function.apply(),
        close: function() {
          done();
        }
      });
 
      var dfd = Q.defer();
      spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
      new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo');
      dfd.resolve();
    });
 
    it('fails the promise with the 500 error when the "error" callback is executed', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: function(type, callback) {
          if (type === 'error') {
            callback(null);
          }
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo')
        .fail(function(error){
          expect(error.code).toBe(500);
          done();
        });
    });
 
    it('fails the promise with the 500 error when verb status is NOK', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: function(type, callback) {
          if (type === 'message') {
            callback(
              'frame1',
              'frame2',
              'verb:NOK',
              msgpack.encode('frame4'),
              'frame5'
            );
          }
        }
      });
 
      var client = new SubzeroClient(config);
      client.call('foo')
        .fail(function(error){
          expect(error.code).toBe(500);
          done();
        });
    });
 
    it('closes the socket when the promise is rejected', function(done) {
      spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
        connect: Function.apply(),
        send: Function.apply(),
        on: Function.apply(),
        close: function() {
          done();
        }
      });
 
      var dfd = Q.defer();
      spyOn(Q, 'defer').andReturn(dfd);
 
      new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo');
      dfd.reject();
    });
 
    describe('Frames', function(){
 
      describe('Frame #1', function() {
        it('contains the operation info', function(done){
          var request = 'REQ:' + config.serviceId;
 
          spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
            connect: Function.apply(),
            on: Function.apply(),
            send: function(frames){
              expect(frames[0]).toEqual(request);
              done();
            }
          });
 
          new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo');
        });
      });
 
      describe('Frame #2', function() {
        it('contains a UUID', function(done){
          spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
            connect: Function.apply(),
            on: Function.apply(),
            send: function(frames){
              expect(frames[1]).toMatch(/([a-f\d]{8}(-[a-f\d]{4}){3}-[a-f\d]{12}?)/ig);
              done();
            }
          });
 
          new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo');
        });
      });
 
      describe('Frame #3', function() {
        it('contains the operation VERB', function(done){
          spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
            connect: Function.apply(),
            on: Function.apply(),
            send: function(frames){
              expect(frames[2]).toEqual('FOO');
              done();
            }
          });
 
          new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo');
        });
      });
 
      describe('Frame #4', function() {
        it('contains the request options encoded in msgpack', function(done){
          spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
            connect: Function.apply(),
            on: Function.apply(),
            send: function(frames) {
              expect(msgpack.decode(frames[3])).toEqual({
                foo: 'bar'
              });
              done();
            }
          });
 
          new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo', {
            foo: 'bar'
          });
        });
      });
 
      describe('Frame #5', function() {
        it('contains the additional parameters encoded in msgpack', function(done){
          spyOn(zmq, 'socket').andReturn({
            connect: Function.apply(),
            on: Function.apply(),
            send: function(frames){
              expect(msgpack.decode(frames[4])).toEqual({
                pony: 'Rainbow Dash'
              });
              done();
            }
          });
 
          new SubzeroClient(config).call('foo', {
            foo: 'bar'
          });
        });
      });
 
    });
  });
});
 
Generated by istanbul at Fri Feb 14 2014 13:58:42 GMT+0000 (WET)
